meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Charlene Lee Terry McElhennon Ashley Wilson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7206.

td.p: Charlene Lee, a journalist from Jersey City, New Jersey
Terry McElhennon, a customer service representative from New Bern, North Carolina
Ashley Wilson, an organization development consultant from Alexandria, Virginia (whose 2-day cash winnings total $52,402)

tr.td: IF THEY MARRIED
STATE CAPITALS
MEDICINE
RUSSIAN RULERS
4-LETTER WORDS, SAME FIRST & LAST LETTER
EMMY: THE MEN
